title: Firecrawl Web Page Reader

openaiSpec.name: get_web_page_content_scraped_by_firecrawl

pageUrl.description: The URL of the web page to scrape for content.

openaiSpec.description: Retrieves the content of a web page by scraping it using the Firecrawl API

userSettings.name: firecrawlApiKey
userSettings.label: Firecrawl API Key
userSettings.description: Enter your Firecrawl API key. You can create one at https://www.firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys

userSettings.name: onlyMainContent
userSettings.label: Only Main Content
userSettings.description: Indicates whether to scrape only the main content. Optional, default value is true.

userSettings.name: responseFormat
userSettings.label: Response Format
userSettings.description: Specifies the format of the response from Firecrawl. Optional, default value is markdown.

overviewMarkdown:
# Firecrawl Web Page Reader

This plugin allows users to read and analyze a web page by scraping its content using the [Firecrawl Scrape API](https://docs.firecrawl.dev/api-reference/endpoint/scrape).

ðŸ‘‰ **Get started with the Firecrawl Scrape API:**  
- API Documentation: https://docs.firecrawl.dev/api-reference

ðŸ”‘ **Set up your Firecrawl API Key and Authenticate:**  
- Firecrawl API requires an API key for access. Learn more at https://www.firecrawl.dev/app/api-keys
- Update the plugin's user settings:
  - **Firecrawl API Key:** `fc-XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX`  

## â— Important Notes

### Rate Limits
There are rate limits for API requests depending on different pricing plans. Learn more at https://docs.firecrawl.dev/rate-limits.

### Pricing Plans
Firecrawl offers various subscription types. Make sure to review the available features and limitations in your current plan. See more details at https://www.firecrawl.dev/pricing.
